meanings.definition: The act of walking or traveling on foot.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the peaceful pedestrianisms in the park.
meanings.sent2: The city encourages pedestrianisms by adding more sidewalks.
meanings.sent3: His clumsy pedestrianisms always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful pedestrianisms through the forest were like a dance.
meanings.sent5: The crowded street was filled with the sounds of various pedestrianisms.

meanings.definition: The practice or skill of walking in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: His unique pedestrianisms caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The dance instructor taught them the art of elegant pedestrianisms.
meanings.sent3: Her exaggerated pedestrianisms during the race made her stand out.
meanings.sent4: His confident pedestrianisms on the runway impressed the judges.
meanings.sent5: The old man's slow pedestrianisms reflected his peaceful nature.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a pedestrian.
meanings.sent1: His rude pedestrianisms at the crosswalk annoyed other pedestrians.
meanings.sent2: The city guide emphasized the importance of respectful pedestrianisms.
meanings.sent3: Her cheerful pedestrianisms brightened up the busy street.
meanings.sent4: His cautious pedestrianisms showed his awareness of traffic.
meanings.sent5: The reckless pedestrianisms of the teenagers worried the parents.
